extendedInfo.description: IFSEC International 2012, 14 â 17 May at the NEC, Birmingham, UK, is the only event to bring together the entire international security buying and influencing chain. Over 25,000 security professionals meet 650+ exhibitors from over 100 countries to discover the very latest innovations within the commercial security and fire safety market.Product areas cover: Access Control, CCTV, Counter Terror, Fire Solutions, Intruder Alarms, IP/Networks, Lone Worker and Physical Security. Features for 2012 include 5 new free to attend seminar theatres, show features, 80+new exhibitors and 1000s of new solutions launched to market.

reviews.title: It crashes every time I try to run it
reviews.comment: It was fine until the latest update, at which point it started saying \"an error has occurred and been logged\" every time I try to load the app.
reviews.author: A Google User
